Shopping is a daily necessity. In this module, you'll master three key areas:
1. **Shop vocabulary** â€” supermarkets, markets, and malls
2. **Service vocabulary** â€” banks, post offices, and salons
3. **Money talk** â€” prices, payments, and bargaining

> [!important] **Myth Buster** "Cash Only?"
> Think you need a suitcase of cash in Eastern Europe? Wrong! Ukraine is a leader in cashless payments. You can pay with Apple Pay or Google Pay almost everywhere â€” in the subway, at a tiny coffee kiosk, and often even at the market. **Ð“Ð¾Ñ‚Ñ–Ð²ÐºÐ°** (cash) is becoming rare!

### Ukrainian Banking

Ukraine has a very advanced banking system.
Traditional banks usually focus on physical branches. But modern neo-banks live in your phone.
The most famous is **Monobank** (symbolized by a cat). It has no branches. You open an account via app in 10 minutes.
You can send money to friends instantly using their phone number or card number. Everyone splits restaurant bills ("ÑÐºÐ¸Ð½ÑƒÑ‚Ð¸ÑÑ Ð½Ð° ÐºÐ°Ñ€Ñ‚Ñƒ") using apps.
Nobody writes paper checks. It's all digital.

Also, currency exchange (**Ð¾Ð±Ð¼Ñ–Ð½ Ð²Ð°Ð»ÑŽÑ‚**) is strictly regulated but accessible. You can buy Dollars or Euros in the app or at bank branches.

### Online Shopping in Ukraine

Ukrainians love online shopping ("Ð†Ð½Ñ‚ÐµÑ€Ð½ÐµÑ‚-ÑˆÐ¾Ð¿Ñ–Ð½Ð³").
- **Rozetka**: The "Amazon of Ukraine". You can buy everything from electronics to pasta.
- **Prom.ua**: A marketplace for small sellers.
- **Zakaz.ua**: Grocery delivery from big supermarkets like Auchan or Metro.
- **OLX**: For buying used items (second-hand).

Most people order delivery to a "Nova Poshta" branch, not to their home address, because it's cheaper and more convenient. You come, check the item, and then pay (**Ð¾Ð¿Ð»Ð°Ñ‚Ð° Ð¿Ñ€Ð¸ Ð¾Ñ‚Ñ€Ð¸Ð¼Ð°Ð½Ð½Ñ–**).

### Food Delivery

If you are hungry, you don't need to cook.
In big cities like Kyiv or Lviv, you will see many couriers with yellow or green backpacks.
Apps like **Glovo** or **Bolt Food** work 24/7. You can order sushi, burgers, or even borscht from your favorite restaurant. Just open the app, choose the food, and wait 30 minutes. It is fast and tasty.

> [!tip] **Tip** "Sales"
> Black Friday is popular in Ukraine, but big **Ñ€Ð¾Ð·Ð¿Ñ€Ð¾Ð´Ð°Ð¶** (sales) also happen in January and July. Look for signs saying **"Ð—Ð½Ð¸Ð¶ÐºÐ¸ Ð´Ð¾ -70%"**. It's the best time to buy clothes!

### Ukrainian Banking

Ukraine has a very advanced banking system.
Traditional banks usually focus on physical branches. But modern neo-banks live in your phone.
The most famous is **Monobank** (symbolized by a cat). It has no branches. You open an account via app in 10 minutes.
You can send money to friends instantly using their phone number or card number. Everyone splits restaurant bills ("ÑÐºÐ¸Ð½ÑƒÑ‚Ð¸ÑÑ Ð½Ð° ÐºÐ°Ñ€Ñ‚Ñƒ") using apps.
Nobody writes paper checks. It's all digital.

Also, currency exchange (**Ð¾Ð±Ð¼Ñ–Ð½ Ð²Ð°Ð»ÑŽÑ‚**) is strictly regulated but accessible. You can buy Dollars or Euros in the app or at bank branches.

### Online Shopping in Ukraine

Ukrainians love online shopping ("Ð†Ð½Ñ‚ÐµÑ€Ð½ÐµÑ‚-ÑˆÐ¾Ð¿Ñ–Ð½Ð³").
- **Rozetka**: The "Amazon of Ukraine". You can buy everything from electronics to pasta.
- **Prom.ua**: A marketplace for small sellers.
- **Zakaz.ua**: Grocery delivery from big supermarkets like Auchan or Metro.
- **OLX**: For buying used items (second-hand).

Most people order delivery to a "Nova Poshta" branch, not to their home address, because it's cheaper and more convenient. You come, check the item, and then pay (**Ð¾Ð¿Ð»Ð°Ñ‚Ð° Ð¿Ñ€Ð¸ Ð¾Ñ‚Ñ€Ð¸Ð¼Ð°Ð½Ð½Ñ–**).

### Food Delivery

If you are hungry, you don't need to cook.
In big cities like Kyiv or Lviv, you will see many couriers with yellow or green backpacks.
Apps like **Glovo** or **Bolt Food** work 24/7. You can order sushi, burgers, or even borscht from your favorite restaurant. Just open the app, choose the food, and wait 30 minutes. It is fast and tasty.

> [!tip] **Tip** "Sales"
> Black Friday is popular in Ukraine, but big **Ñ€Ð¾Ð·Ð¿Ñ€Ð¾Ð´Ð°Ð¶** (sales) also happen in January and July. Look for signs saying **"Ð—Ð½Ð¸Ð¶ÐºÐ¸ Ð´Ð¾ -70%"**. It's the best time to buy clothes!
